mapper.sql: host_id, email, first_name, last_name, phone, gender, date_of_birth, retired, pets, smoker, referral_source, password
mapper.insert:
insert into host
host_id,
email,
first_name,
last_name,
phone,
gender,
date_of_birth,
retired,
pets,
smoker,
referral_source,
password,

mapper.update:
update host
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
retired = #{retired,jdbcType=BIT},
pets = #{pets,jdbcType=BIT},
smoker = #{smoker,jdbcType=BIT},
referral_source = #{referralSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where host_id = #{hostId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update host set email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, retired = #{retired,jdbcType=BIT}, pets = #{pets,jdbcType=BIT}, smoker = #{smoker,jdbcType=BIT}, referral_source = #{referralSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where host_id = #{hostId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
